thread.title: Sydney International: Johanna Konta into semi-finals & Dan Evans reaches third round
thread.title_full: Sydney International: Johanna Konta into semi-finals & Dan Evans reaches third round

title: Sydney International: Johanna Konta into semi-finals & Dan Evans reaches third round
text:
Read more about sharing. Evans is ranked 67 in the men's standings, while Konta is the women's world number 10 British number one Johanna Konta reached the Sydney International semi-finals, while men's number three Dan Evans also progressed on Wednesday. 
World number 10 Konta triumphed 6-3 7-5 against Russian 19-year-old Daria Kasatkina, who beat world number one Angelique Kerber in the previous round. 
The 25-year-old will face Canadian Eugenie Bouchard in the last four. 
Evans, 26, beat Spanish eighth seed Marcel Granollers 1-6 6-3 6-3 to reach the third round. 
He will face the winner of the match between top seed Dominic Thiem of Austria and Portuguese qualifier Gastao Elias. Share this page
